author: trawick
msg: mod_log_config: Add format options for %p so that the actual local
or remote port can be logged.
Extensively commented on and/or modified by Ruediger Pluem and Jeff Trawick

author: jonesde
msg: Added result-to-result feature for seca rules, based on patch from Adrian Crum but changed to be more consistent with context-to-result, AND to only copy over values that are valid for the service that triggered the eca; Jira #OFBIZ-1237

author: cam
msg: Avoid numerical accuracy problems when determining if an interval must
sample the final value while frozen.  Fixes bug 41947.
